critique: The document establishes a temporary office (ITAO) within the Department of State to support the transition and reconstruction efforts in Iraq. It focuses on concluding infrastructure projects, facilitating Iraq's self-sufficiency, and maintaining a diplomatic presence. The order outlines the functions, personnel, and administrative aspects of the ITAO, emphasizing coordination, oversight, and reporting. It also includes general provisions regarding implementation, non-creation of rights, and termination of the office.
